snippet: Thousands of people attended the service of Chris Kyle, a retired Navy SEAL sniper and author who investigators say was killed by a troubled veteran he was trying to help.
abstract: Thousands of people attend Arlington, Tex, funeral service for Chris Kyle, retired Navy SEAL sniper and author who investigators say was killed by Eddie Ray Routh, troubled veteran he was trying to help.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of people attended the service of Chris Kyle, a retired Navy SEAL sniper and author who investigators say was killed by a troubled veteran he was trying to help.

headline.seo: Chris Kyle, Ex-Sniper, Recalled as Warrior and Father
headline.main: At Texas Service, Mourners Remember Slain Ex-Sniper as Warrior and Family Man
